info.brief_description: choose a character from the show and get into naughty situations Rewards for good chapters
info.description:
Hello, and welcome to Petropolis home of the Turbo Undercover Fighting Force.

Rewards for good chapters, you get what you give

Pretty much anything goes except for vore, bathroom play, and gore.

General Rule for adding chapters:
- Try to keep chapter length to at least a paragraph, unless a one liner absolutely unavoidable such as when a previous option directly leads to a new question.
- When adding a new chapter make sure you add an additional "others" option at the bottom so that someone else can put their ideas into the story.
- No ending paths because you do not like where the story is heading. As stated above there should be an "other" option for you to change the path of the story if you so desire.
- If you do change the path of the story do so in a way that builds off the previous chapter, i.e. no starting a whole new story in the middle of a path.
- Try to keep the story going and try to add onto any unopened paths before going to other.
-No troll posts. =_= You know what I mean.
